fields.summary: Windows: SearchBar should show No Results text if there are no results in a search

fields.description: In {{Ti.UI.SearchBar}}, when there are no results shown there should be a single result shown saying 'No Results'. We implemented it in TIMOB-24975 as hard-coded string but we could use i18n resources so we can display it in other languages.
fields.summary: Windows: Use i18n resource for SearchBar "No Results"
